name: Board games (itch)
description:
This is a digital remake of the existing card game Take 5. It is a game for 2-5 players.

Game rules: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/6_Nimmt!

Usage: run the server executable.

Next, run start a number of Windows or Android clients, and log in to the server IP.  (Use WAN IP and set up port forwarding for port 51112 when not all devices are on the same LAN.) Open a new game room, and share the game room code with the other players.
